name: Hawkins, Inc.
description: Hawkins, Inc. is a leading provider of specialty chemicals and ingredients, dedicated to serving the needs of various industries, including food, pharmaceutical, water treatment, and industrial applications. Founded in 1935, Hawkins has built a reputation for quality, reliability, and innovation in chemical distribution and manufacturing. The company operates through several segments, including Food, Pharmaceutical, and Industrial, which allow it to offer a wide range of products such as food additives, pharmaceutical raw materials, and water treatment chemicals. With a commitment to sustainability, Hawkins focuses on environmentally responsible practices and is continually expanding its product offerings to meet the evolving needs of its customers. The company is headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and operates multiple facilities across the United States. With a customer-centric approach, Hawkins aims to provide exceptional service and support, ensuring that clients receive the best solutions for their specific requirements. Through its experienced team and strong industry partnerships, Hawkins is poised for continued growth and innovation in the specialty chemicals sector.
